name: Duck Warming and Display Cabinet TH80
line1: Duck Warming and Display Cabinet TH80 (920×500×800mm)
line2: 1200W power, 220V/50Hz. Hot air drying system, adjustable temperature 0–300°C, humidity 15–150°C. Capacity: up to 20 ducks. Ideal for displaying and keeping roast duck warm.

name: Duck Drying Cabinet 1 Door
line2: 1100W power, 220V/50Hz, capacity 25–30 ducks, drying time 12–24 hours. 500L chamber, stainless steel build, dual 250mm fans for even airflow. Suitable for restaurants or roast shops.

name: Duck Drying Cabinet 2 Doors
line2: 1800W power, 220V/50Hz, capacity 50–60 ducks, drying time 12–24 hours. Dual 500L chambers, stainless steel, 4 circulating fans for faster and even drying performance.

name: Duck Drying Cabinet 3 Doors
line2: 1800W power, 220V/50Hz, capacity 70–90 ducks/hour. Triple stainless steel doors, 1500L chamber, adjustable temperature, dual 250mm fans for consistent drying results.

name: Roast Duck Oven Inox Curved 80
line2: High-grade stainless steel curved design, 45kg, 8–12 ducks per batch. Charcoal or gas fuel. Includes 15 hooks, 15 skewers, 1 burner. Distributor: T&H Food Machine.

name: Roast Duck Oven Inox Curved 90
line2: Double-layer inox construction, 50kg, capacity 10–12 ducks. Works with gas or charcoal. Includes 15 hooks, 15 skewers, 1 burner. Distributor: T&H Food Machine.

name: Glass Roast Duck Oven 680
line2: Transparent heat-retaining glass, 12V motor, 220V power, charcoal heating. Capacity 6–8 ducks. Includes 20 hooks and 1 burner. Sleek display design.

name: Glass Roast Duck Oven 850
line2: 12V motor, 220V power, charcoal/gas fuel. Capacity 13–15 ducks per batch. Includes 20 hooks, 1 burner. Ideal for large restaurants and street kitchens.

name: Roast Duck Oven Inox 40
line2: Compact stainless oven, 1–2 ducks per batch, charcoal or gas heating. Ideal for small takeaway kitchens. Includes skewers. Warranty: 12 months.

name: Roast Duck Oven Inox 60
line2: Stainless steel design, 6–8 ducks per batch. Uses charcoal or gas. Includes hooks, burner, 12-month warranty. Distributor: T&H Food Machine.

name: Roast Duck Oven Inox 80
line2: Durable stainless steel body, 38kg, 8–10 ducks. Charcoal or gas fuel, includes hooks, skewers, and burner. For medium kitchens.

name: Roast Duck Oven Inox 90
line2: Stainless build, 42kg, 12–15 ducks per batch. Uses gas or charcoal. 12-month warranty. Comes with full hook set.

name: Roast Duck Oven Inox 100
line2: High-grade stainless steel, capacity 12–15 ducks. Gas or charcoal heating, 45–60min roasting time. Suitable for large kitchens.

name: Glass Roast Duck Oven 80
line2: Tempered glass with stainless frame, 8–12 ducks. Gas/charcoal heating, includes hooks & burner. Elegant display design.

name: Glass Roast Duck Oven 90
line2: 4 tempered glass panels with inox frame, 10–12 ducks capacity. Gas/charcoal fuel. Even heat distribution and clear viewing.

name: Air Pump for Duck Roaster 80W
line2: 80W motor, 0.027 bar pressure, 65L/min airflow. Compact and quiet. Ideal for inflating duck skin before roasting.

name: Charcoal Stove for Duck Oven
line2: Compact clay-core stove for ovens 80–850mm. Retains heat efficiently. Comes with 10 free stainless skewers from T&H.

name: Wide-mouth Charcoal Stove for Duck Oven
line2: Fits ovens 80–850mm, steel alloy body. Efficient airflow, easy to clean. Includes 10 free stainless skewers.
